bibl.title: Funerary Stelae with the Orans-Motif (Workshop Traditions of Terenuthis during the Roman Occupation of Egypt).
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Toronto. Summary in DA 47 (1986-1987) p. 4216-A. Catalogue of 162 stelae, with epigraphic, palaeographic and stylistic analyses. The chronology of the stelae should be lowered by over a century, i.e. from early in the first to the mid-third century A.D.
McCleary Roger Vincent, Funerary Stelae with the Orans-Motif (Workshop Traditions of Terenuthis during the Roman Occupation of Egypt).
